title: Ep 127 | Jesus vs. the Cancel Mob and Phil Robertson's Answer to Cancel Culture
description:
Phil, Jase, and Al are fed up with cancel culture, and they're laying it down: The cancel mob is the exact opposite of Jesus. Jase pinpoints the problem with cancel culture, Al urges mass forgiveness, and Phil has the perfect answer to the cancel mob. Jase also points out the current panic over our Founding Fathers' beliefs about Jesus. But first, Phil talks about the day he quit climbing trees, Jase reveals Jep's secret to awesome crab legs, Phil shares his hidden talent for matchmaking, and the guys say goodbye to the Unashamed Command Center.

Get Jesus Politics by Phil Robertson, available now: https://www.amazon.com/Jesus-Politics-Back-Soul-America/dp/1400210062/
